New Records: Rohit Sharma has been dismissed for 80s as many as 4 times in a calendar year in ODI cricket
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 87 runs in 101 balls before being dismissed
Miscellaneous Highlights: India posted 229 for 9 in 50 overs against England
Others: Rohit Sharma's knock of 87 was worth its weight in gold as he steered the team on a tough pitch
